snippet: The indictment follows charges against three Wegelin bankers accused of conspiring to help American clients hide more than $1.2 billion in assets.
abstract: Swiss bank Wegelin & Co is indicted in New York on federal charges that it had helped Americans evade taxes.
lead_paragraph: The indictment follows charges against three Wegelin bankers accused of conspiring to help American clients hide more than $1.2 billion in assets.
